hero.title: Projects that unite BI students
hero.subtitle: Fadderullan, Winter Games, Karrieredagene and Inspire create community, networking and unforgettable experiences across every campus.

insight.title: Why these projects matter
insight.item1: Volunteers from every campus plan and deliver the experiences together.
insight.item2: Partners meet students throughout the year on meaningful arenas.
insight.item3: They build traditions, pride and CV-worthy experience for everyone involved.

featuredTitle: Four highlights you should not miss
featuredSubtitle: Start with the projects that define BISO’s culture.

fadderullan.title: Fadderullan
fadderullan.description: Norway’s largest student festival packed with concerts, activities and welcoming meetups for new and returning students.

winterGames.title: Winter Games
winterGames.description: BISO’s winter trip gathers students from across the country for skiing, afterski and networking.

karrieredagene.title: Karrieredagene
karrieredagene.description: Meet leading companies, join workshops and secure interviews with top employers in your region.

inspire.title: Inspire
inspire.description: A stage for inspirational talks, insights and stories from students, alumni and leaders.

schedule.title: More upcoming projects
schedule.subtitle: Keep track of current and planned initiatives from BISO.
schedule.empty: Additional flagship projects have not been published yet – stay tuned!
